dotnetType.name: UnionDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.UnionSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new record deserializer builder case.

returns.summary: A function that accepts a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and returns a deserialized object.

overloads.summary: Builds a union deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.
The deserializer builder to use to build child deserializers.

returns.summary: Whether the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.UnionSchema" /> of one or more schemas.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.

returns.summary:
Always true; this case will apply but fail if the type cannot be mapped to each schema
            in the union.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnionDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
